verses.verse: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> further to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Make <S%H6213><s%> yourself two <S%H8147><s%> trumpets <S%H2689><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> of hammered <S%H4749><s%> work <S%H4749><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> them; and you shall use <S%H1961><s%> them for summoning <S%H4744><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and for having the camps <S%H4264><s%> set <S%H4550><s%> out.

"And when both <S%H1992><s%> are blown, <S%H8628><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall gather <S%H3259><s%> themselves to you at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

"Yet if <S%H518><s%> [only] one <S%H259><s%> is blown, <S%H8628><s%> then the leaders, <S%H5387><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the divisions <S%H505><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall assemble <S%H3259><s%> before <S%H413><s%> you.
"But when you blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm, <S%H8643><s%> the camps <S%H4264><s%> that are pitched <S%H2583><s%> on the east <S%H9506><s%> side <S%H9506><s%> shall set <S%H5265><s%> out.

"And when you blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm <S%H8643><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time, <S%H8145><s%> the camps <S%H4264><s%> that are pitched <S%H2583><s%> on the south <S%H8486><s%> side <S%H8486><s%> shall set <S%H5265><s%> out; an alarm <S%H8643><s%> is to be blown <S%H8628><s%> for them to set <S%H4550><s%> out.
"When convening <S%H6950><s%> the assembly, <S%H6951><s%> however, you shall blow <S%H8628><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> sounding <S%H7321><s%> an alarm. <S%H7321><s%>

"The priestly <S%H3548><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> moreover, shall blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets; <S%H2689><s%> and this shall be for you a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute <S%H2708><s%> throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>

"And when <S%H3588><s%> you go <S%H935><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the adversary <S%H6862><s%> who attacks <S%H6887><s%> you, then you shall sound <S%H7321><s%> an alarm <S%H7321><s%> with the trumpets, <S%H2689><s%> that you may be remembered <S%H2142><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and be saved <S%H3467><s%> from your enemies. <S%H340><s%>

"Also in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your gladness <S%H8057><s%> and in your appointed <S%H4150><s%> feasts, <S%H4150><s%> and on the first <S%H7218><s%> [days] of your months, <S%H2320><s%> you shall blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of your peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings; <S%H8002><s%> and they shall be as a reminder <S%H2146><s%> of you before <S%H6440><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>"

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was lifted <S%H5927><s%> from over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony; <S%H5715><s%>

and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out on their journeys <S%H4550><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%> Then the cloud <S%H6051><s%> settled <S%H7931><s%> down <S%H7931><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran. <S%H6290><s%>

So they moved <S%H5265><s%> out for the first <S%H7223><s%> time <S%H7223><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> according to their armies, <S%H6635><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out first, <S%H7223><s%> with Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> its army, <S%H6635><s%>
and Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar, <S%H6686><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tribal <S%H4294><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar; <S%H3485><s%>
and Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon <S%H2497><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tribal <S%H4294><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>

Then the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was taken <S%H3381><s%> down; <S%H3381><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> who were carrying <S%H5375><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out.

Next the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to their armies, <S%H6635><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out with Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur, <S%H7707><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> its army, <S%H6635><s%>
and Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai <S%H6701><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tribal <S%H4294><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%>
and Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel <S%H1845><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> the tribal <S%H4294><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad. <S%H1410><s%>

Then the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out, carrying <S%H5375><s%> the holy <S%H4720><s%> [objects;] and the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was set <S%H6965><s%> up before <S%H5704><s%> their arrival. <S%H935><s%>

Next the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> according to their armies, <S%H6635><s%> was set <S%H5265><s%> out, with Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> its army, <S%H6635><s%>
and Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur <S%H6301><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tribal <S%H4294><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%>
and Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni <S%H1441><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tribal <S%H4294><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

Then the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> according to their armies, <S%H6635><s%> [which formed] the rear <S%H622><s%> guard <S%H622><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the camps, <S%H4264><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out, with Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai <S%H5996><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> its army, <S%H6635><s%>
and Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ochran <S%H5918><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tribal <S%H4294><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher; <S%H836><s%>
and Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan <S%H5881><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tribal <S%H4294><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>
This <S%H428><s%> was the order <S%H4550><s%> of march <S%H4550><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their armies <S%H6635><s%> as they set <S%H5265><s%> out.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Hobab <S%H2246><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%> the Midianite, <S%H4084><s%> Moses' father-in-law, "We are setting <S%H5265><s%> out to the place <S%H4725><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> 'I will give <S%H5414><s%> it to you'; come <S%H1980><s%> with us and we will do <S%H3190><s%> you good, <S%H3190><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has promised <S%H1696><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
But he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "I will not come, <S%H1980><s%> but rather <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> to my [own] land <S%H776><s%> and relatives. <S%H4138><s%>"

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> do not leave <S%H5800><s%> us, inasmuch <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> as you know <S%H3045><s%> where we should camp <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and you will be as eyes <S%H5869><s%> for us.

"So it will be, if <S%H3588><s%> you go <S%H1980><s%> with us, it will come <S%H1961><s%> about that whatever <S%H834><s%> good <S%H9185><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does <S%H3190><s%> for us, we will do <S%H3190><s%> for you."

Thus they set <S%H5265><s%> out from the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey, <S%H1870><s%> with the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> journeying <S%H5265><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of them for the three <S%H7969><s%> days, to seek <S%H8446><s%> out a resting <S%H4496><s%> place <S%H4496><s%> for them.
And the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> them by day, <S%H3119><s%> when they set <S%H5265><s%> out from the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the ark <S%H727><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out that Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Rise <S%H6965><s%> up, O Lord! <S%H3068><s%> And let Thine enemies <S%H340><s%> be scattered, <S%H6327><s%> And let those who hate <S%H8130><s%> Thee flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Thee."

And when it came <S%H5117><s%> to rest, <S%H5117><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Return <S%H7725><s%> Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> [To] the myriad <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
